Event.MetaDescription: Everyone are invited to attend this Bramhotsavam from 25th June to 9th July.
Event.Address: Eelapatheeswarar Aalayam, Pavitt Hall Union Road, HA0 4AU - Tel: 0208 902 3238
Event.Maindescription:
Shiva Temple at Wembley are celebrating BRAMHOTSAVAM from 25th June to 9th July.

The main item of the programme ie Chariot Festival ( Ther Thiruvizha ) - outside procession is taking place on SUNDAY 8th July 10am to 2pm.The chief priest Rajasekara Gurrukal has specially requested our bhajan group to conduct bhajan for these 4 hours inspite of my answer 2 hours from 10am to 12pm. So we have agreed to do this - with Lord's blessings we hope to carry out this task to the best of our ability.

I would be grateful if you could inform SIS members so that anyone interested could join us.

Address of Temple :
EElapatheeswarar Aalayam
(Shiva Temple - Wembley )
Pavitt Hall Union Road
HA0 4AU
( Tel: 0208 902 3238 )

If anyone is interested in joining or need to know more about this please ask them to me contact me - 0208 909 0871.

]]>
